t: SPORTSHERO - WIKIPEDIA
s: September 6, 2024 - SportsHero is a real-time fantasy sports app and social prediction platform. Within the app, users make predictions on match, game, competition results. These users are ranked based on information provided by other fans and experts in the community, as well as real-time news and statistics.
